title: CSP disc brake kit bearing sizes needed.

posts.content:
Hi all,

I'm trying to identify some of the CSP disc kit components. I've had their 55-63 on my bus for around six years with no problem. MOT man says I need a new wheel bearing. I've pulled the outer one and it is a 32005X (Â£10 from simplybearings.co.uk), but I need to know the code on the inner plus the spindle seal dimensions.

Anyone have a 55-63 kit that could givce me some codes and dimensions.

btw, the calipers seems to be Vauxhall Cavalier 1.8 FWD with some machining mod.

I can get the bits from CSP but I can get them cheaper over hear just down the road. I could pull the rotor and take a look but I like to get the parts in before I start a job.

Any help appreciated

Lee

'57 samba

Hiya Lee

Why don't you try Machine7 They stock CSP Kits so may know the dimensions. Have you tried BSL in Trafford Park if you take your sample they will prob have the bearing and seal in stock

http://www.brammer.co.uk/uk_brammer_products.aspx

Yeah, thanks. Looks like I'll have to pull the parts to check out the dimensions anyway if no-one knows.

Lee

hi mate
just been and found the empty boxs for my csp bearings, same sutup as yours 55 to 63, the outer is 32206a and the inner is 32005x both are fag bearings, hope this is what you were after...............al

Great thanks I didn't know the other number. I think you got the boxes mixed up as the 32005x is definitely the smaller outer and the 32206 looks to the be the larger inner.

cheers for replying

Lee
